metadata.description: Claude Code plugin marketplace featuring productivity tools, document processing skills, creative capabilities, and development workflows with Git automation, code review, testing, and MCP integration

plugins.name: example-full-featured
plugins.description: Full-featured productivity plugin with Git workflow automation, code review agents, test generation, validation hooks, and example MCP server

plugins.name: document-skills
plugins.description: Collection of document processing suite including Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and PDF capabilities

plugins.name: example-skills
plugins.description: Collection of example skills demonstrating various capabilities including skill creation, MCP building, visual design, algorithmic art, internal communications, web testing, artifact building, Slack GIFs, and theme styling

plugins.name: agent-sdk-dev
plugins.description: Development kit for working with the Claude Agent SDK

plugins.name: pr-review-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR review agents specializing in comments, tests, error handling, type design, code quality, and code simplification

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Commands for git commit workflows including commit, push, and PR creation

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive feature development workflow with specialized agents for codebase exploration, architecture design, and quality review

plugins.name: security-guidance
plugins.description: Security reminder hook that warns about potential security issues when editing files, including command injection, XSS, and unsafe code patterns

plugins.name: development-workflow-skills
plugins.description: Professional development workflow skills from obra/superpowers including test-driven development, git worktrees, and branch completion workflows
